Plot: A power hungry sorcerer transforms a princess into a swan by day in this tale of everlasting love.
Title: The Swan Princess
Writer: Richard Rich (story), Brian Nissen (story), Brian Nissen (screenplay)
Actors: Jack Palance, Howard McGillin, Michelle Nicastro, Liz Callaway
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 7 nominations.
